member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource
member.summary: Properties related to data source in cascading Combo, which corresponds to the selected value in parent combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource.DataSource
member.summary: Gets sets reference to DataSource used by Combo for DataSourceKey. That property is required.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource.DataSourceKey
member.summary: Gets sets key which will be used to define DataSource for selected value in parent Combo. That property is optional, if it is not set, then index of that object within collection will be used as key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource.ValueKey
member.summary: Gets sets override for ValueKey for DataSource. That property is optional, if it is not set, then ValueKey of Combo will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource.TextKey
member.summary: Gets sets override for TextKey for DataSource. That property is optional, if it is not set, then TextKey of Combo will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingDataSource.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Gets sets override for DataSourceUrl. That property is optional.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettings
member.summary: Container of properties related to cascading functionality.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettings.ParentComboID
member.summary: Gets sets the ID of parent Combo which is used for cascading functionality. The selected value in parent Combo will be used as key to adjust dataSource in this Combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettings.ParentComboKey
member.summary: Gets sets the key of column in dataSource which will be used to get records matching with selected value in parent Combo. That property has effect only when ParentComboID is set and it has no effect if CascadingDataSources is set. If that option is set, then data is filtered internally, therefore, filtering while changing text in editor is not available. If that property is set, then LoadOnDemand is not supported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettings.CascadingDataSources
member.summary: Get sets collection of objects which allows to configure dataSource and other properties of this Combo. Note: that property has effect only when ParentComboID is set and it has priority over ParentComboKey.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettingsWrapper
member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboCascadingSettingsWrapper.Model
member.summary: A reference to the model for this wrapper.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Combo (igCombo widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list is opened.
Return false in order to cancel drop-down action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.
Note: on the very first opening or option-change that member is null and application should check that before using that member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpened
member.summary:
Event which is raised after drop-down list was opened.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownClosing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list is closed.
Return false in order to cancel hide action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownClosed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after drop-down list was closed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource used by combo.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary:
Event which is raised after data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource used by combo.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.TextChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value in field was modified by user.
It is not raised when value of field was modified internally, for example, after filling-up from matching item while autoComplete.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.text to obtain new text in field.
Use ui.oldText to obtain old text in field.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.SelectionChanging
member.summary:
Event which is raised before selection change.
Return false in order to cancel change.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.items to obtain reference to array of new selected items. That can be null.
Use ui.oldItems to obtain reference to array of old selected items. That can be null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.SelectionChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after selection change.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.items to obtain reference to array of new selected items. That can be null.
Use ui.oldItems to obtain reference to array of old selected items. That can be null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.ActiveItemChanging
member.summary:
Event which is raised before change of active item in list.
Return false in order to cancel change.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.index to obtain index of new active item.
Use ui.oldIndex to obtain index of old active item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.ActiveItemChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after change of active item in list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.index to obtain index of new active item.
Use ui.oldIndex to obtain index of old active item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.NoMatchFound
member.summary:
Event which is raised after field was modified by end user and autoComplete was not able to find matching item in list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.text to obtain text in field.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.Filtering
member.summary:
Event which is raised before filtering.
Return false in order to cancel filtering.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.expression to obtain reference to array which contains expressions supported by $.ig.DataSource.
Each expression-item contains following members: fieldName (textKey), cond (filteringCondition), expr (value/string to filter).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.Filtered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after filtering.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.expression to obtain reference to array which contains expressions supported by $.ig.DataSource.
Each expression-item contains following members: fieldName (textKey), cond (filteringCondition), expr (value/string to filter).

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account filtering Request params. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: intercepts the controller call, and transforms the action result into a json result.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuting(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutingContext)
member.summary: implementation of the ActionExecuting event

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.BuildPredicate(System.Collections.Generic.List{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FilterExpression})
member.summary: converts a list of filtering expressions into a LINQ predicate

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelWidgetBase.ClientEvents
member.summary:
Set implementations of client events raised by a widget.
Event handler assumes 2 parameters: 1st parameter has name "evt" and 2nd parameter has name "ui". To get information about member variables available for "ui" parameter, please consult documentation of a widget and its events.
Examples:
1. Full implementation:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "function(evt,ui){alert('drop:'+ui.owner);}" } }
2. Content of inline function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "alert('drop:'+ui.owner);" } }
3. Name of global function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "nameOfGlobalFunction" } } Note:
Instead of explicit key-strings, which represent name of event exposed by a widget, the event-constants defined by a particular control can be used.
Example:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening, "nameOfGlobalFunction" } }

member.summary: Create ComboModel

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.UpdateFromClient(System.Web.Mvc.Controller)
member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p: Note: that is a wrapper for this.UpdateFromClient(controller, null)

member.param: Reference to controller (in order to get the Request object)
member.returns: True: client value was found and update was successful. False: failure to update.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.UpdateFromClient(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String)
member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p: That method can be used by a controller while processing "post" event, when Combo was created other than ComboFor and application needs to change timing of build-in persistence.

member.param: Reference to controller (in order to get the Request object)
Optional name of Combo which is used to pass value from client. It is missing, then InputName is used.
member.returns: True: client value was found and update was successful. False: failure to update.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.GetClientValues(System.Web.HttpRequest,System.String,System.Nullable{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataType})
member.summary: Gets array of selected values from client.

remarks.p: That method will attempt to obtain client value from request and convert it to array of objects specified by the type parameter.

If AllowCustomValue is enabled, then value of Combo can be user-entered string. In this case the type should be null, Auto, or String and client value will appear as the first item in returned array of strings.

member.param: Type of objects which will contain returned array. If type is null, or Auto, or String, then string[] will be returned. If type is Number, then double[] will be returned. If type is Date, then DateTime[] will be returned. If type is Bool, then bool[] will be returned.
member.returns: Array of string, double, DateTime or bool objects. If request does not contain value for the "name" or items could not be converted to specified type, then null is returned.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.GetClientValues(System.Web.Mvc.Controller,System.String,System.Nullable{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataType})
member.summary: Gets array of selected values from client.

remarks.p: That method will attempt to obtain client value from the Request of controller and convert it to array of objects specified by the type parameter.

If AllowCustomValue is enabled, then value of Combo can be user-entered string. In this case the type should be null, Auto, or String and client value will appear as the first item in returned array of strings.

member.param: Type of objects which will contain returned array. If type is null, or Auto, or String, then string[] will be returned. If type is Number, then double[] will be returned. If type is Date, then DateTime[] will be returned. If type is Bool, then bool[] will be returned.
member.returns: Array of string, double, DateTime or bool objects. If request does not contain value for the "name" or items could not be converted to specified type, then null is returned.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.GetClientValues(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.Nullable{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataType})
member.summary: Gets array of selected values from client.

remarks.p: That method will attempt to obtain client value from the ViewContext.HttpContext.Request of helper and convert it to array of objects specified by the type parameter.

If AllowCustomValue is enabled, then value of Combo can be user-entered string. In this case the type should be null, Auto, or String and client value will appear as the first item in returned array of strings.

member.param: Type of objects which will contain returned array. If type is null, or Auto, or String, then string[] will be returned. If type is Number, then double[] will be returned. If type is Date, then DateTime[] will be returned. If type is Bool, then bool[] will be returned.
member.returns: Array of string, double, DateTime or bool objects. If request does not contain value for the "name" or items could not be converted to specified type, then null is returned.

member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSource
member.summary: Set data source for data displayed in list.

remarks.p:
The expected value is instance of IQueryable.
It also can be array of objects, which represent rows in list.
If value is string value, then it is assumed to be an url address which points to source of data.
Example: "http ://odata.netflix.com/Catalog/Titles?$format=json&$callback=?"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CompactData
member.summary: Set option to pass to client only data with ValueKey and TextKey columns.

remarks.p: That property has effect only when DataSource is IQueryable

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Set URL that will be used to fetch data while remote filtering.

remarks.p: A controller should process ComboDataSourceAction and return a View with data source which will be used by Combo to perform filtering.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedValues

remarks.p: Note: If value is set, then SelectedIndexes is set to null.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Text
member.summary: Sets text which appears in field when control is created.

remarks.p: Note: If AllowCustomValue is disabled and SelectedIndex or SelectedValues is not set, then first matching item in list will be selected.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.NoMatchFoundText
member.summary: Sets text which appears in drop-down list when filtering is enabled and not match items were found.

member.summary: Sets text for tooltip of drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render an item in list.

remarks.p:
Notes:
1. Template is rendered inside of LI html element.
2. If the "enableCheckboxes" option is enabled, then checkboxes are still supported and rendered.
So, application should consider restriction for layout: do not use "block" html elements and in case of absolutely positioned elements, they should not overlap with checkbox icons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render header in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Sets template used to render footer in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseTotalRecCountKey
member.summary: Sets property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

remarks.p: For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseDataKey
member.summary: Sets the name of record which holds the list of data rows in response-JSON object and when CompactData is disabled.

remarks.p: Default value is set to "Records". It means that rows of items should belong to the Records object.
For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Format
member.summary: Sets format which is applied to items in list.

remarks.p:
Value "auto" will use automatic format for Date and number objects.
Empty value will disable automatic format.
Custom values can be something like "currency", "percent", "dateLong", "time", "MMM-dd-yyyy H:mm tt", etc.
However, custom format should be valid for a specific data type in "textKey" column.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringCondition
member.summary:
Sets condition used for filtering.
That can be any value supported by javascript $.ig.DataSource class. Examples: "startsWith", "contains", "endsWith".
Notes:
If the "autoComplete" option is enabled, then the "startsWith" is used regardless of value for this option.
If "CascadingSettings.ParentComboKey" is set, then data is filtered internally, therefore, filtering while changing text in editor is not available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text displayed in field when it has no focus and no value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilterExprUrlKey
member.summary: Sets url key for the remote filtering.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSourceType
member.summary: Sets data source type such as "json", "xml", etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedValuesType
member.summary: Sets type of values returned from client by the get of SelectedValues property.

remarks.p: Note: if that property is not set, then SelectedValues can return array of string, DateTime or double objects.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AllowCustomValue
member.summary: Sets ability to enter and keep custom value in field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectItemBySpaceKey
member.summary: Sets ability to select active item in list by Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets enabled state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AutoComplete
member.summary: Sets ability to autocomplete field from matching item in list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.EnableActiveItem
member.summary: Sets ability to show active/focus item in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Focus item can be modified by arrow and other action keys and selection can be toggled by the Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets ability to append container of drop-down list to the body or to the parent of combo.

remarks.p:
If parent of drop-down is body, then list should appear on top other elements on page.
In this case drop-down will not be scrolled with container of Combo. In specific complex layouts it is possible that drop-down list will have wrong location.
If parent of drop-down list is the same as parent of Combo, then scrolling and positioning will be improved.
In this case, if container of Combo has enabled overflow, then visibility of drop-down list rectangle can be cut-off by parent.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Virtualization
member.summary: Sets ability to use virtual rendering for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ShowDropDownButton
member.summary: Sets visibility of drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.EnableClearButton
member.summary: Sets ability to show a button which allows to clear field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Sets ability to use case sensitive or ignore case searching for matches defined by RenderMatchItems and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownOnFocus
member.summary: Sets ability to show drop-down list when Combo gets focus.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataBindOnOpen
member.summary: Sets ability to load data (bind DataSource) at the time when drop-down list is opened.

remarks.p:
Notes:
1. Before data is loaded the SelectedItems, value, text and other options/methods will fail.
2. Initial selection, text and value will have no effect.
3. If on first drop-down the DataSource does not contain SelectedItems (for example, enabled load on demand), then selection will be destroyed.
4. To get around with values, an application may enable AllowCustomValue and use the Text instead of SelectedItems.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CloseDropDownOnBlur
member.summary: Sets ability to close drop-down list when combo loses focus.

remarks.p: Note: If application disables that property, then it is responsible for closing drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CloseDropDownOnSelect
member.summary: Sets ability to close drop-down list when item in list is selected.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.EnableDisplayBlock
member.summary: Sets display attribute of style to "block". Default is "inline-block".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.TabIndex
member.summary: Sets tabIndex attribute to input field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownWidth
member.summary: Sets width of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0 and width of combo is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets maximum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownMinHeight
member.summary: Sets minimum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of show drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of hide drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringType
member.summary: Sets type of filtering.

remarks.p:
Notes:
If this property is set to Remote, then the css class "waitFiltering" is applied to combo and its drop-down list, and MultiSelection option is not supported.
If "CascadingSettings.ParentComboKey" is set, then data is filtered internally, therefore, filtering while changing text in editor is not available. Though, that property will still define type of filtering used by cascading functionality.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.RenderMatchItemsCondition
member.summary: Sets condition used for rendering of matching parts in items of drop-down list.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ValueKeyType
member.summary: Sets type of values used for data cell/items with ValueKey.

remarks.p: That value is assign to schema of javascript $.ig.DataSource class.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.TextKeyType
member.summary: Sets type of values used for data cell/items with TextKey.

remarks.p: That value is assign to schema of javascript $.ig.DataSource class.

member.summary: Sets functionality mode, such as editable, drop-down, read-only.

member.summary: Sets ability to select multiple items in list.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboWrapper.UpdateFromClient(System.Web.HttpRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Update properties of Combo from values modified on client.

remarks.p:
That method can be used, when Combo was created other than ComboFor and application needs to change timing of build-in persistence.
Example:
Html.Infragistics().Combo().ID("Combo1").DataSource(new int[]{1,2,3}).UpdateFromClient(this.Request, "Combo1").Render()

member.param: Optional name of Combo which is used to pass value from client. It is missing, then InputName is used.

member.summary:
Event which is raised on keydown event.

Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.KeyPress
member.summary:
Event which is raised on keypress event.
Return false in order to cancel key action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.
Set ui.key to another character which will replace original entry.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.KeyUp
member.summary:
Event which is raised on keyup event.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mousedown at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseUp
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseup at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseMove
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mousemove at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseOver
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseover at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseLeave
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseleave at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Focus
member.summary:
Event which is raised when input field of editor gets focus.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Blur
member.summary:
Event which is raised when input field of editor loses focus.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ValueChanging
member.summary:
Event which is raised before value in editor was changed.
Return false in order to cancel change.
It can be raised on lost focus or on spin events.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ValueChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value in editor was changed. It can be raised on lost focus or on spin events.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.TextChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after text in editor was changed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.InvalidValue
F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Spin
member.summary:
Event which is raised on spin event.
Return false in order to cancel spin.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.delta to obtain delta for increment or decrement.
Use ui.value to obtain the "value" of editor before spin action.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ButtonClick
member.summary:
Event which is raised when button was clicked by mouse.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ShowDropDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list or calendar is opened.
Return false in order to cancel drop-down action.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.HideDropDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list or calendar is opened.
Function takes argument evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.value to obtain reference to the selected item in list or Date in calendar.
If ui.value is not null and not undefined, that it means that drop-down was closed due to selection from drop-down list or from calendar.
Otherwise, drop-down was closed due to lost focus or Esc key press.
Return false in order to cancel hide action and keep drop-down visible.
It is not recommended to cancel that action on blur event.
Note: In case of calendar of datepicker, the evt or evt.originalEvent can be null. That happens if calendar was closed on blur or by Esc key.
Returning the false in this situation will not prevent closing drop-down calendar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ListSelecting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before list item is selected.
Return false in order to cancel select action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.index to get new selected index.
Use ui.oldIndex to get old selected index.
Use ui.item to get reference to new selected item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ListSelected
member.summary:
Event which is raised after list item was selected.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.index to get new selected index.
Use ui.oldIndex to get old selected index.
Use ui.item to get reference to new selected item.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Cell Merging (igGridCellMerging widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents.CellsMerging
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before a new merged cells group is created. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridCellMerging. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igGridCellMerging are initialized for. Use ui.value to get the cells value which is repeated and caused the merged group to be created.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents.CellsMerged
member.summary: Event fired after a new merged cells group is created. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridCellMerging. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igGridCellMerging are initialized for. Use ui.value to get the cells value which is repeated and caused the merged group to be created. Use ui.count to get the total count of cells that were merged.

member.summary: Specifies the opacity of the drag markup, while a column header is being dragged. The value must be between 0 and 1. When GroupBy is enabled, the corresponding option in the GroupBy configuration will be used with priority over this one.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Column Moving (igGridColumnMoving widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragStart
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is fired when a drag operation begins on a column header use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column being dragged use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column being dragged use args.owner to get a reference to the widget use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th being dragged use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that's actually being dragged

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragEnd
member.summary: Event which is fired when a drag operation ends on a column header use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged use args.owner to get a reference to the widget use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragCanceled
member.summary: Event which is fired when a drag operation is canceled use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged use args.owner to get a reference to the widget use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnMoving
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is fired when a column moving operation is initiated use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved use args.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved use args.owner to get a reference to the widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnMoved
member.summary: Event which is fired when a column moving operation completes use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was moved use args.oldIndex to get the previous column index of the column that was moved use args.newIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved use args.owner to get a reference to the widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogOpening
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired before the moving dialog is opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogOpened
member.summary: event fired after the column chooser is already opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogDragged
member.summary: event fired every time the moving dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. Use ui.position to get the current position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogClosing
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired before the moving dialog is closed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogClosed
member.summary: event fired after the moving dialog has been closed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogContentsRendering
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired before the contents of the model dialog are rendered. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogContentsRendered
member.summary: event fired after the contents of the model dialog are rendered. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogMoveUpButtonPressed
member.summary: event fired when move up button is pressed in the moving dialog The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved Use ui.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved Use ui.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogMoveDownButtonPressed
member.summary: event fired when move down button is pressed in the moving dialog The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved Use ui.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved Use ui.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogDragColumnMoving
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired when column moving is initiated through dragging it in the moving dialog The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved Use ui.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved Use ui.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogDragColumnMoved
member.summary: event fired when column moving is completed through dragging it in the moving dialog The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved Use ui.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved Use ui.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DataFiltering
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before a filtering operation is executed (remote request or local). Return false in order to cancel filtering operation. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnIndex to get column index. Use ui.columnKey to get column key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DataFiltered
member.summary: Event fired after the filtering has been executed and results are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnIndex to get column index. Use ui.columnKey to get column key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DropDownOpening
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the filter dropdown is opened for a specific column. Return false in order to cancel dropdown opening. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dropDown to get reference to dropdown DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DropDownOpened
member.summary: Event fired after the filter dropdown is opened for a specific column. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dropDown to get reference to dropdown DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DropDownClosing
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the filter dropdown starts closing. Return false in order to cancel dropdown closing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dropDown to get reference to dropdown DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.DropDownClosed
member.summary: Event fired after a filter column dropdown is completely closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dropDown to get reference to dropdown DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogOpening
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the advanced filtering dialog is opened. Return false in order to cancel filter dialog opening. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialog to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogOpened
member.summary: Event fired after the advanced filter dialog is already opened. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialog to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogMoving
member.summary: Event fired every time the advanced filter dialog changes its position. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialog to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogFilterAdding
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before a filter row is added to the advanced filter dialog. Return false in order to cancel filter adding to the advanced filtering dialog. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.filtersTableBody to get reference to filters table body DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogFilterAdded
member.summary: Event fired after a filter row is added to the advanced filter dialog. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.filter to get reference to filters table row DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogClosing
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the advanced filter dialog is closed. Return false in order to cancel filtering dialog closing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.

member.summary: Event fired after the advanced filter dialog has been closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.

Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogContentsRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the contents of the advanced filter dialog are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridFilteringClientEvents.FilterDialogFiltering
member.summary: Event fired when the OK button in the advanced filter dialog is pressed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dialog to get reference to filtering dialog DOM element.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Framework (igGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.CellClick
member.summary: Event fired when a cell is clicked. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.cellElement to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.colIndex to get column index. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before data binding takes place. Return false in order to cancel data binding. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary: Event fired after data binding is complete. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Rendering
member.summary: Event fired before the grid starts rendering (all contents). This event is fired only when the grid is being initialized. It will not be fired if the grid is rebound to its data (for example, when calling the dataBind() API method or when changing the page size (when paging is enabled)). Return false in order to cancel grid rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Rendered
member.summary: Event fired after the whole grid widget has been rendered (including headers, footers, etc.). This event is fired only when the grid is being initialized. It will not be fired if the grid is rebound to its data (for example, when calling the dataBind() API method or when changing the page size (when paging is enabled)). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataRendering
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the TBODY holding the data records starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel data records rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataRendered
member.summary: Event fired after all of the data records in the grid table body have been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderRendering
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the header starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel header rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the header has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.table to get reference to headers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.FooterRendering
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before the footer starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel footer rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.FooterRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the footer has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.table to get reference to footers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderCellRendered
member.summary: Event fired after every TH in the grid header has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnKey to get column key. Use ui.th to get reference to header cell DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RowsRendering
member.summary: Event fired before actual data rows (TRs) are rendered. Return false in order to cancel rows rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.tbody to get reference to grid's table body.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RowsRendered
member.summary: Event fired after data rows are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.tbody to get reference to grid's table body.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.SchemaGenerated
member.summary: Event fired after $.ig.DataSource schema has been generated, in case it needs to be modified. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.schema to get reference to data source schema. Use ui.dataSource to get reference to data source.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.ColumnsCollectionModified
member.summary: Event fired after the columns colection has been modified(e.g. a column is hidden) Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RequestError
member.summary: event fired if there is an error in the request, when the grid is doing a remote operation, such as data binding, paging, sorting, etc. use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid use ui.message to get the error message coming from the server

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Created
member.summary: fired when the grid is created and the initial structure is rendered (this doesn't necessarily imply the data will be there if the data source is remote) use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Destroyed
member.summary: fired when the grid is destroyed use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid GroupBy (igGridGroupBy widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.GroupedColumnsChanging
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is fired when the grouped columns collection is about to change. This event is not fired when group/ungroup from groupby modal dialog use args.owner in order to access the groupby widget object use args.owner.grid to access the grid widget option use args.groupedColumns to get a reference to the current groupedColumns use args.key to get a reference to the current column's key that's being grouped use args.layout to get a reference to the current layout object, if any use args.grid to get a reference to the current child grid element, in case it's an hierarchical grid

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.GroupedColumnsChanged
member.summary: event which is fired when the groupedColumns collection has changed. This event is fired also when group/ungroup from groupby modal dialog but key, layout and grid are not set use args.owner in order to access the groupby widget object use args.owner.grid to access the grid widget option use args.groupedColumns to get a reference to the current groupedColumns use args.key to get a reference to the current column's key that's being grouped use args.layout to get a reference to the current layout object, if any use args.grid to get a reference to the current child grid element, in case it's an hierarchical grid

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.ModalDialogMoving
member.summary: cancel="false" Event fired every time the groupby dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridGroupBy widget. use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object. use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the groupby dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. use ui.position to get the current position of the groupby dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.ModalDialogClosing
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired before the modal dialog is closed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridGroupBy widget. use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Row Selectors (igGridRowSelectors widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.RowSelectorClicked
member.summary: Event fired after a row selector is clicked. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.CheckBoxStateChanging
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired when a row selector checkbox is changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for. Use ui.currentState to get the current state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.newState to get the new state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.isHeader to check if the header check box is the one being clicked. In this case no row related args are passed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.CheckBoxStateChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a row selector checkbox had changed state. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for. Use ui.state to get the state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.isHeader to check if the header check box is the one being clicked. In this case no row related args are passed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Selection (igGridSelection widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.RowSelectionChanging
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before row(s) are about to be selected (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel selection changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.row.element to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.row.index to get row index. Use ui.selectedRows to get reference to rows object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.RowSelectionChanged
member.summary: Event fired after row(s) are selected. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.row.element to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.row.index to get row index. Use ui.selectedRows to get reference to rows object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.CellSelectionChanging
member.summary: cancel="true" Event fired before cell(s) are about to be selected (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel cell selection changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.cell.element to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.cell.columnKey to get reference to column key. Use ui.cell.index to get column index. Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.selectedCells to get reference to selected cells object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.CellSelectionChanged

Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.selectedCells to get reference to selected cells object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

Use ui.row.index to get active row index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogOpening
member.summary: cancel="true" event fired before the modal dialog is opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogOpened
member.summary: event fired after the modal dialog is already opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. member.summary: event fired every time the modal dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the modal dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. Use ui.position to get the current position of the modal dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.summary: Event is fired after summary rows are toggled Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.isToShow to get whether summaries are shown or not. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Hidden
member.summary: Initial visibility of the column. A column can be hidden without the Hiding feature being enabled but there will be no UI for unhiding it. Columns can be defined as hidden in the options of the Hiding feature as well and those definitions take precedence.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Format
member.summary:
format for cells
If DataType is "date", then supported formats are following:
"date", "dateLong", "dateTime", "time", "timeLong", "MM/dd/yyyy", "MMM-d, yy, h:mm:ss tt", "dddd d MMM", etc.
If DataType is "number" or not set, then supported numeric formats are following:
"number", "currency", "percent", "int", "double", "0.00", "#.0####", "0", "#.#######", etc. The value of "double" will be similar to "number", but with unlimited maximum number of decimal places
If DataType is "string" or not set, then format is rendered as it is with replacement of possible "{0}" flag by value in cell
Example, if format is set to "Name: {0}" and value in cell is "Bob", then value will appear as "Name: Bob"
If DataType is "bool", then supported format is "checkbox" which will override the RenderCheckboxes property of grid.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Template
member.summary: Sets a template for an individual column. the contents of the template should be the HTML markup that goes inside the table cell, without any and tags included in front and at the end. The syntax of the template, when referencing data keys and using conditional expressions is the same as the one for rowTemplate

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Rowspan
member.summary: Sets a rowspan for the grid column. Rowspan will be applied if the grid has multicolumn headers

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions
member.summary: Combo editor options for column updating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Virtualization
member.summary: Set ability to use virtual rendering for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ShowDropDownButton
member.summary: Set visibility of drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.EnableClearButton
member.summary: Set ability to show a button which allows to clear field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Set ability to use case sensitive or ignore case searching for matches defined by RenderMatchItems and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownOnFocus
member.summary: Set ability to show drop-down list when Combo gets focus.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AllowCustomValue
member.summary: Set ability to enter and keep custom value in field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.SelectItemBySpaceKey
member.summary: Set ability to select active item in list by Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AutoComplete
member.summary: Set ability to autocomplete field from matching item in list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.EnableActiveItem
member.summary: Set ability to show active/focus item in drop-down list.

remarks.p: Focus item can be modified by arrow and other action keys and selection can be toggled by the Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets ability to append container of drop-down list to the body or to the parent of combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CompactData
member.summary: Sets ability to send to client all data or only required data (TextKey and ValueKey).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DataSource
member.summary: Set data source for data displayed in list.

remarks.p:
The expected value is instance of IQueryable.
It also can be array of objects, which represent rows in list.
If value is string value, then it is assumed to be an url address which points to source of data.
Example: "http ://odata.netflix.com/Catalog/Titles?$format=json&$callback=?"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validation options.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ValueKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the "value".

remarks.p: If it is missing, then name of first column will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.TextKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the displayed text.

remarks.p: If it is missing, then ValueKey will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ItemSeparator
member.summary: Sets separator between items in field used when MultiSelection is enabled.

remarks.p: Default value is ", ".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Set URL that will be used to fetch data asynchronously.

remarks.p: A controller should process ComboDataSourceAction and return a View with data source.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownWidth
member.summary: Sets width of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0 and width of combo is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets maximum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownMinHeight
member.summary: Sets minimum height of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of show drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of hide drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FilteringType
member.summary: Sets type of filtering.

remarks.p: If this property is set to Remote, then the css class "waitFiltering" is applied to combo and its drop-down list, and MultiSelection option is not supported.
Note: remote filtering is not supported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.RenderMatchItemsCondition
member.summary: Sets condition used for rendering of matching parts in items of drop-down list.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ValueKeyType
member.summary: Sets type of values used for data cell/items with ValueKey.

remarks.p: That value is assign to schema of javascript $.ig.DataSource class.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.TextKeyType
member.summary: Sets type of values used for data cell/items with TextKey.

remarks.p: That value is assign to schema of javascript $.ig.DataSource class.

It can be regional-pattern-flags such as "date", "dateLong", "time", "timeLong", "dateTime". Or it can be explicit date-time patterns such as "d/MM/yyyy", "d-M-yy, HH:mm:ss", "h:mm tt, fff", etc.

member.summary:
Sets name of regional setting.
That property can be used, only when application provides $.ig.regional[value] javascript object, which contains custom values recognized by igDateEditor.
Example for members of that object can be found in the $.ig._regional, which is located in ig.util.js file and contains default values.

Example for members of that object can be found in the $.ig._regional, which is located in ig.util.js file and contains default values.
