member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Updating (igGridUpdating widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowStarting
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before start row editing. Return false in order to cancel editing and do not show editors in row. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowStarted
member.summary: Event which is raised after start row editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowEnding
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before end row editing. Return false in order to cancel update of data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.keepEditing=true in order to keep editing. It has effect only when evt.originalEvent is defined. Use ui.update to check if value of any cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding. Use ui.values[key] to get value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get old value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowEnded
member.summary: Event which is raised after end row editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.update to check if value of any cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding. Use ui.values[key] to get value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get old value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellStarting
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before start cell editing. Return false in order to cancel start editing and do not show editors. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get or set value of editor. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellStarted
member.summary: Event which is raised after start cell editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of editor. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellEnding
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before end cell editing. Return false in order to cancel update of data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.keepEditing=true in order to keep editing. It has effect only when evt.originalEvent is defined and only when editMode is "cell". Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of cell/editor. That value can be modified and it will be used to update data source. Use ui.oldValue to get old value. Use ui.update to check if value was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellEnded
member.summary: Event which is raised after end cell editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of cell. Use ui.oldValue to get old value. Use ui.update to check if cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowAdding
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before adding new row. Return false in order to cancel adding new row to data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.values[key] to get new value of cell in column with the key. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get default value (before editing) of cell in column with the key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowAdded
member.summary: Event which is raised after adding new row. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.values[key] to get new value of cell in column with the key. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get default value (before editing) of cell in column with the key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowDeleting
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised before row deleting. Return false in order to cancel. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.element to get reference to jquery object which represents TR of row to delete. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row to delete.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowDeleted
member.summary: Event which is raised after row deleting. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.element to get reference to jquery object which represents TR of row to delete. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row to delete.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.DataDirty
member.summary: cancel="true" Event which is raised when autoCommit of grid is not enabled and grid has pending transaction which may fail to be correctly rendered. Application should process that event and it may trigger commit of grid. Return false in order to prevent exception. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.GeneratePrimaryKeyValue
member.summary: cancel="false" Event which is raised before adding new row to get value of cell for primaryKey column. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.value to set unique record-key-identifier for new row. It is prefilled with suggested value (defaultValue of column or number of rows in data source)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogOpening
member.summary: cancel="false" Event fired before the row edit dialog is opened. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account all Request params such as paging, sorting, and filtering. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorWrapper.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Enables validation with default options.

remarks.p: If Required is enabled, then validation message will appear if edit field is empty.
If MinValue and or MaxValue is set, then validation message will appear if editor has value outside of these limits.
Validation message will appear if entered value is invalid number (for example, user entered only "." or "-").

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorWrapper.ValidatorOptions(System.Nullable{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Enables validation with explicit basic options

remarks.p: In order to set other validator options, the ValidatorOptions(Action) setter should be used.

member.param: Action related to keeping focus in editor when validation failed
Trigger validation when editor loses focus
Trigger validation when text in editor was changed (including keypress)
Trigger validation when form gets onsubmit event
Custom error message which replaces all specific error messages

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorWrapper.Render
member.summary: Render the widget with the accumulated model changes in the wrapper.
member.returns: The rendered HTML of the widget.

member.summary: A reference to the model for this wrapper.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of control on client. Required property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.InputName
member.summary:
Sets the name of the hidden input element that will store the value.
If it is not set then the value of ID is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Value
member.summary: Sets value for editor. Note: If Value is set, then new value will have priority over value modified on client. Client value will not persist between postbacks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ButtonType
member.summary: Sets option to show drop-down or spin buttons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.TextAlignment
member.summary: Sets text alignment in editor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SelectionOnFocus
member.summary: Sets type of selection when editor gets focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Display
member.summary: Sets display attribute of style to block or to inline-block.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets enabled state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ReadOnly
member.summary: Sets read only state of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SpinOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows spin value (by up/down arrow keys and spin buttons) when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DropDownOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows to show drop-down list and change value from list when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Width
member.summary: Sets width of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Height
member.summary: Sets height of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.HideEnterKey
member.summary: Hides the Enter key from browser. If true hides the Enter key, if false does not change default logic of browser related to the Enter key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text which will be displayed in editor when it has no value and no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validator options. Note: this option will have effect only when application registers ig.ui.validator.js and ig.ui.validator.css.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListWidth
member.summary: Sets drop-down list width in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets drop-down list maximum height in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListColumns
member.summary: Sets drop-down list number of columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while showing drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while hiding drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ListDropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets drop-down list as child of editor. If true create html element which represents drop-down list as child of editor, if false use the body as parent for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Regional
member.summary: Sets name of regional setting. Name of culture/country. For example, "bg", "fr", etc. Note: in order for that setting to have effect, an object with name $.ui.igEditor.regional["localeCode"] should be availble on client.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.PositivePattern
member.summary: Sets custom pattern which is used to display positive numbers in no focus state. Format used for positive numbers. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NegativePattern
member.summary: Sets custom pattern which is used to display negative numbers in no focus state. Format used for negative numbers. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Symbol
member.summary: Sets currency symbol. That is used when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets minimum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets maximum number which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MaxDecimals
member.summary: Sets maximum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MinDecimals
member.summary: Sets minimum number of decimal places displayed in editor when it has no focus. Number of decimal places. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DataMode
member.summary: Sets data mode. That affects the get/set value method.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.DecimalSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as decimal separator. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.GroupSeparator
member.summary: Sets the character which is used as group/thousand separator. That setting has effect only when editor has no focus. Default value is defined by current culture/regional.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.ScientificFormat
member.summary: Enables scientific format to display numeric value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.NullValue
member.summary: Sets numeric value which is used by editor when no value was entered (or value is null). That also is used by get/set value method when value in editor is not set. Number which is used as replacement for not set value or null value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SpinDelta
member.summary: Sets gets delta-value which is used to increment or decrement value in editor on spin events.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.Nullable
member.summary: Enables null value in editor. If that options is disabled, then 0 or NullValue is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.MaxLength
member.summary: Sets maximum length of text in editor

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.TabIndex
member.summary: Sets tabIndex attribute for editor

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.FocusOnSpin
member.summary: Ensures that editor has focus when spin button is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.SpinWrapAround
member.summary: Enables circular spin: after the last item is list, the first item in list is used as next item.

member.summary: Sets disabled state of the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ReadOnly
member.summary: Sets read only state of the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.SpinOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows spin value (by up/down arrow keys and spin buttons) when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DropDownOnReadOnly
member.summary: Allows to show drop-down calendar or list and change value from calendar or list when ReadOnly is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Width
member.summary: Sets width of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Height
member.summary: Sets height of editor in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.HideEnterKey
member.summary: Hides the Enter key from browser. If true hides the Enter key, if false does not change default logic of browser related to the Enter key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down calendar or list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text which will be displayed in editor when it has no value and no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Required
member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validator options. Note: this option will have effect only when application registers ig.ui.validator.js and ig.ui.validator.css.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while showing drop-down calendar or list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds while hiding drop-down calendar or list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Regional
member.summary: Sets name of regional setting. Name of culture/country. For example, "bg", "fr", etc. Note: in order for that setting to have effect, an object with name $.ui.igEditor.regional["localeCode"] should be availble on client.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DateDisplayFormat
member.summary: Sets custom date format used for display mode (no focus state).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DateInputFormat
member.summary: Sets custom date format used for input/edit mode (focus state).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets minimum date which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets maximum date which can be entered by user.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.MinNumberOfDateFields
member.summary: Sets minimum number of date fields which will define if entered value is a valid or invalid date. If number of entered fields is equal or larger than that value, then remaining missing fields will be filled automatically.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DataMode
member.summary: Sets data mode. That affects the get/set value method.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.PromptCharacter
member.summary: Sets the character which is used for available positions in date-mask when editor has focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.HideMaskOnFocus
member.summary: Hides or shows input mask when editor gets focus. If true hides input mask, if false shows all input mask with prompts when editor gets focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Nullable
member.summary: Enables null value in editor. If that options is disabled, then current date is used is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.TabIndex
member.summary: Sets tabIndex attribute for editor

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.CenturyThreshold
member.summary: Sets year for auto detection of 20th and 21st centuries. That option is used to automatically fill century when the user entered only 1 or 2 digits into the year field or when the date pattern contains only 1 or 2 year positions, e.g. "yy" or "y". If user entered value larger than value of this option, then 20th century is used, otherwise the 21st.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.EnableUTCDates
member.summary: Sets formatting of the dates as UTC. That option is supported only when DataMode option is 'Date' and Date objects are used to get/set value of editor. Notes: That option affects only functionality of get/set value method and the Date-value, which was set on initialization. When application uses the set-value, then internal Date-value and displayed-text is incremented by TimezoneOffset. When application uses the get-value, then editor returns internal Date-value decremented by TimezoneOffset.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ReduceDayOfInvalidDate
member.summary: Sets ability to decrease day of month. Value of true allows decreasing day of month, when editor loses focus and user entered day of month which is larger the maximum for that particular month. Value of false will automatically increment month and decrease day of month. Examples. If true and user entered "09/31/2010", then on lost focus that string will be converted to "09/30/2010". If false, then in similar situation the string will be converted to "10/01/2010".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.UseLastGoodDate
member.summary: Set ability to use last valid date when user entered invalid value. Value of true allows automatically use last valid date, when editor loses focus and user failed to enter a valid date. In case of value false, the entered date is considered invalid and null is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.YearShift
member.summary: Sets difference between year in Gregorian calendar and displayed year.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Spin1Field
member.summary: Sets ability to modify only 1 date field on spin events. Value false enables changes of other date fields when incremented or decremented date-field reaches its limits. Value true modifies only value of one field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.FocusOnSpin
member.summary: Ensures that editor has focus when spin button is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.SpinDelta
member.summary: Sets gets delta-value which is used to increment or decrement the value of field where caret is located is modified.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.SpinWrapAround
member.summary: Enables circular spin: after the last item is list, the first item in list is used as next item.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list. Note: if that property is set, then drop-down list is used instead of drop-down calendar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListWidth
member.summary: Sets drop-down list width in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets drop-down list maximum height in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListColumns
member.summary: Sets drop-down list number of columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListDropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets drop-down list as child of editor. If true create html element which represents drop-down list as child of editor, if false use the body as parent for drop-down list. Note: that property is not supported for drop-down calendar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DropDownButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ClearButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for clear button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DecrementSpinButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for decrement spin button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.IncrementSpinButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for increment spin button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.NumericEditorModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.NumericEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.NumericEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.DisplayFactor
member.summary: Sets the factor which used for the get and set of the "value" method. On get the number (string) entered by user is divided by that factor and on the set the number (string) displayed in editor is multiplied by that factor. For example if factor is 100 and the "value" is set to 0.123, then editor will show string "12.3".
member.remarks: The value should be a power of 10. If another value is supplied the biggest number that is a power of 10 and is less than the supplied value will be used. Values less than or equal to 0 will be ignored. Note: this option has priority over possible regional settings.

member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list and for filtering keyboard entries.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TextEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TextEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Validator (igValidator widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.CheckValue
member.summary:
Event which is raised on validation before default validation logic is applied.
Return false in order to consider value as invalid and to display error message with ui.message.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Validation
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value was validated but before any action takes effect.
Return false to keep possible old/current error message unchanged, and possible new error message is not displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.invalid to get state, where true is invalid and false is valid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShowing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is displayed.
Return false in order to prevent error message display.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHiding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is hidden.
Return false in order to keep error message displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShown
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHidden
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was hidden.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorAlignment.Right

member.summary: Specifies the KeepFocus option of the Validator widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Always
member.summary: Validator attempts to set focus back to target control every time when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Once
member.summary: Validator attempts to set focus back to target control only once when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Never
member.summary: Validator does not set focus back to target control when validation fails.

member.summary: Error message used when validator did not find a proper conditional error message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Select
member.summary: Error message used when Required was set and target is select or checkbox or radio.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength was set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for minimum number of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MaxLength was set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for maximum number of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.RangeSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength and MaxLength were set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for range of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinLength
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength was set and validation for minimum length failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxLength
member.summary: Error message used when MaxLength was set and validation for maximum length failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.RangeLength
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength and MaxLength were set and validation for range failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Required
member.summary: Error message used when Required was set and validation for not empty value failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Range
member.summary: Error message used when MinValue and MaxValue were set and validation for range failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinValue
member.summary: Error message used when MinValue was set and validation for minimum value failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxValue
member.summary: Error message used when MaxValue was set and validation for maximum value failed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel
member.summary: Class describing the options available for the Validator.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.#ctor
member.summary: ValidatorModel constructor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets the maximum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets the minimum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxLength
member.summary: Sets the maximum length of the string or the selected items allowed in the target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in the target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinLength
member.summary: Sets minimum length of string or selected items allowed in target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which shows error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which hides error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets validation for not empty value in target control. Default value is false and validation is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Sets the custom error message.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.RegExp
member.summary: Sets the javascript regular expression which method "test()" will be used for validation of value in control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ConditionalMessages
member.summary: Sets predefined conditional error messages.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Alignment
member.summary: Sets the alignment of error message relative to target control. Default value is Bottom.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.KeepFocusOnError
member.summary: Sets option to keep focus in control when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ShowIcon
member.summary: Sets option to show or hide error icon which is displayed inside of error label in front of error text.validation for not empty value in target control. True: show error icon, false: do not show error icon. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnBlur
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when control loses focus.

remarks.p: True: validate onblur event of browser, false: do not validate on blur. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnChange
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when value in control changes.

remarks.p: True: validate onchange, onkeydown, etc. events of browser, false: do not validate on change. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the onsubmit event is raised on client.

remarks.p: True: validate onsubmit event of browser, false: do not validate onsubmit. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnFormSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the form.submit() method is called by application on client.

remarks.p: True: validate when form.submit() was called, false: do not validate form.submit(). Default value is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.BodyAsParent
member.summary: Sets option to use the BODY or local-parent of target as the parent element for error message. Default value is true and the BODY is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorRenderer.Resource
member.summary: Resource string for the widget. Used in the loader dependent script generation.
